\item 
class \mbox{\hyperlink{class_dead_fuel_moisture}{Dead\+Fuel\+Moisture}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Determines moisture content of dead and down woody fuels from ambient air temperature, relative humidity, insolation, and rainfall. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}
